fields.Title of Presentation: TLC Motherhood: Personal Quest, Feminine Test
fields.Description/Abstract:
with Deneen Gilmour, PhD
Minnesota State University - Moorhead

TLC programming markets motherhood as a badge of personal consequence, further normalizing the idea that a woman’s personal significance is measured and attained through her relationship to others, rather than on her own merit. As motherhood is portrayed as a quest for personal completion, female behavior is regulated and normalized through examples of appropriate mothering.
